title: Mount Olympus Trek
blurb: Forested switchbacks into myth country and big Aegean views.
successBlurb: You power through shaded climbs and are rewarded with sweeping Aegean horizons.
failBlurb: The heat and endless switchbacks leave you wilted before the views appear.

title: Trolltunga Out-and-Back
blurb: Alpine lakes, granite slabs, and that iconic cliff finale.
successBlurb: Clear skies make the lakes sparkle, and the final cliff push feels epic.
failBlurb: Clouds roll in, hiding the lakes and turning the slab scramble into a trudge.

title: Cinque Terre Classic Segment
blurb: Clifftop paths linking five candy-colored villages.
successBlurb: Every turn brings a postcard view of pastel towns above the sea.
failBlurb: The crowds and steep steps make you wish for an easier route between villages.

title: Table Mountain Panorama Loop
blurb: Contour paths & ridges with oceans-on-both-sides moments.
successBlurb: The ridge feels like flying, with water glittering on both horizons.
failBlurb: Fog swallows the ridges, leaving nothing but wet boots and gray air.

title: Arthur's Seat & Coast Loop
blurb: Volcano cone, Salisbury Crags, and Firth of Forth breezes.
successBlurb: You crest the cone with wind in your hair and the whole city below.
failBlurb: Rain slicks the crags and the "view" is a wall of mist.

title: Mount Takao & Jimba Ridge
blurb: Cedar forests, shrine gates, and Fuji peeks on a clear day.
successBlurb: Mt. Fuji floats above shrine gates like a perfect painting.
failBlurb: Haze smothers Fuji, leaving only a sweaty trudge through forest.

title: Dragon's Back & Shek O Loop
blurb: Wavy ridgeline, beaches below, city skyline behind.
successBlurb: The ridgeline rolls like a dragon with sand and skyscrapers shining.
failBlurb: Smog and heat turn the ridge into a slog with no reward.

title: Yosemite Valley Rim Sampler
blurb: Granite domes, pine scent, and waterfall lookouts.
successBlurb: Granite walls glow gold at sunset and the waterfalls thunder beside you.
failBlurb: Trails close, waterfalls trickle, and the domes sit in haze.

title: Banff Lakeshore & Lookouts
blurb: Turquoise lakes & larch viewpoints in one tidy package.
successBlurb: Larches blaze gold above neon-blue lakes in crisp mountain air.
failBlurb: The larches are bare, and the lakes sit dull under clouds.

title: Patagonia Laguna Capri Circuit
blurb: Fitz Roy reflections and lenga forests.
successBlurb: Fitz Roy pierces a blue sky, mirrored in perfect still water.
failBlurb: Clouds cloak the peak, and the "reflection" is just ripples.

title: Aoraki Hooker & Sealy Combo
blurb: Stair master steps to huge glacier-and-peak panoramas.
successBlurb: You crest the final step and glaciers spill out in every direction.
failBlurb: Endless stairs leave you breathless, only to find the peaks hidden.

title: Madeira Levadas Duo
blurb: Narrow canal paths through laurel forest and tunnels.
successBlurb: Cool green tunnels lead you along dreamy canals with birdsong.
failBlurb: Slippery stones and endless mud turn the canal path into a crawl.

title: Camí de Cavalls Segment
blurb: Wild coves, scrub pine, and old watchtowers.
successBlurb: Each cove feels like a secret, watched over by ancient towers.
failBlurb: The coves are crowded, and the towers crumbled beyond charm.

title: Causeway Coast Day Route
blurb: Sea arches, basalt cliffs, and ruinous castles.
successBlurb: The coast delivers drama—arches, black rock, and castle silhouettes.
failBlurb: The weather howls and you barely glimpse ruins through rain.

title: Ring of Kerry Coastal Segment
blurb: Sheep-dotted lanes, Atlantic swells, mountain backdrops.
successBlurb: Sheep wander lanes as waves crash and mountains glow beyond.
failBlurb: Cold wind and rain turn lanes into bogs with invisible views.

title: Petra Backdoor & High Place
blurb: Sandstone stairways into temples and tombs.
successBlurb: You descend carved steps into chambers glowing with history.
failBlurb: The heat, dust, and tour groups drain all sense of wonder.

title: Wadi Rum Sandstone Circuit
blurb: Rust-red dunes, rock bridges, Bedouin tea stops.
successBlurb: You crest a dune at sunset, sip tea, and watch the desert burn orange.
failBlurb: The sandstorm stings, the bridges bake, and no tea in sight.

title: Lycian Way Blue Bays Day
blurb: Piney traverses above neon-blue coves and ruins.
successBlurb: Pines frame turquoise water and crumbling stone in perfect harmony.
failBlurb: The coves are choked with boats, the ruins roped off.

title: Kumano Kodo Nakahechi Day
blurb: Mossy pilgrim stones, shrines, and cedar corridors.
successBlurb: Mossy lanterns guide you through hushed cedar avenues to shrines.
failBlurb: Crowds clog the path, and rain turns mossy steps into slides.

title: Jeju Olle Route Mix
blurb: Lava coastline, tangerine farms, sea stacks.
successBlurb: Waves hammer black rock as you snack on sweet mandarins.
failBlurb: Rain flattens the coast, and farms offer only closed gates.

title: Great Ocean Walk Day 2–3
blurb: Cliff paths and surf thundering below.
successBlurb: Waves explode beneath you while seabirds wheel overhead.
failBlurb: Fog blocks the ocean, leaving only slippery cliffs and fear.

title: Larapinta Ridge Sampler
blurb: Desert ridges, ochre gorges, big Outback skies.
successBlurb: The ridges glow at sunset under endless desert sky.
failBlurb: Heat haze and flies steal all joy from the ochre canyons.

title: Annapurna Poon Hill Short
blurb: Stone steps, rhododendron forests, sunrise on giants.
successBlurb: At dawn, rhododendrons frame snowy peaks blazing pink.
failBlurb: Clouds smother sunrise and the steps feel never-ending.

title: Langtang Valley Day Push
blurb: Mani walls, yak pastures, glacier-spill views.
successBlurb: Yaks graze below walls as white glaciers pour down the peaks.
failBlurb: The altitude pounds, the walls feel endless, and no glacier reveals itself.

title: Drakensberg Amphitheatre Loop
blurb: Escarpment rim drama and thundering Tugela.
successBlurb: The rim yawns wide and Tugela Falls drops like silver thread.
failBlurb: Mist hides the rim and the falls vanish into the void.

title: Sossusvlei Dunes Circuit
blurb: Big Daddy dune climbs and bleached Deadvlei pans.
successBlurb: You crest Big Daddy, slide down to a ghostly white pan of skeleton trees.
failBlurb: Heat shimmers, sand burns, and the pan feels lifeless and flat.

title: Simien Highlands Escarpment
blurb: Gelada troops, knife-edge cliffs, cloud oceans.
successBlurb: Baboons chatter on cliffs while clouds billow like seas below.
failBlurb: The geladas hide, and clouds block every view.

title: Atlas Imlil & Tizi n'Tamaterte
blurb: Berber villages, walnut groves, snowy crests.
successBlurb: Villages glow red against snow peaks and walnut orchards.
failBlurb: Smog, dust, and closed passes ruin the mountain magic.

title: Zion West Rim Highlights
blurb: Slickrock mesas and slot-rim vistas.
successBlurb: The slickrock glows gold and every rim frames a perfect canyon.
failBlurb: Blistering heat and closed slots make the mesas feel barren.

title: Grand Canyon South Rim Traverse
blurb: Rim-to-rim-style lookouts without the full plunge.
successBlurb: Lookouts give full canyon drama with a fraction of the effort.
failBlurb: The viewpoints are packed, and haze dulls the canyon depths.
